name: Copypasta
description:
Copypasta

A multi-layer/multi-frame clipboard tool. Select any number of layers from multiple frames and duplicate that selection to multiple frames simultaneously.

Copypasta is multiplayer-compatible.


How to use Copypasta ğŸ

  1. Run plugin;
  2. Select one or more layers nested in one or multiple frames;
  3. Press â€œSave selectionâ€;
  4. Select one or multiple target frames;
  5. Press â€œDuplicate layersâ€;
  6. The original selection of layers will be duplicated across the selection of target frames.


The plugin has 3 settings:

  • Respect layer index: If switched on, the plugin will paste duplicate layers in the same index as their source (e.g. if the bottom layer of frame A is copied, it will be pasted at the bottom of frame B;
  • Select duplicate layers: If switched on, the plugin will automatically select all new layers after a successful duplication;
  • Keep window open: If switched on, the plugin window will remain open after a successful duplication. The last valid source selection remains saved and can be duplicated to a new selection of target frames.


Use Cases ğŸ”¨

  • (Multi) Paste in place by respecting the original layer index;
  • (Multi) Paste in place even in X and Y values larger than the frame dimensions;
  • Place repetitive elements in a mockup of a website;
  • Spread updates across screens in a app mockup;
  • Quickly iterate new proposals;
  • Merge content;
  • Anything else you find it useful for!


In Detail ğŸ”

  • Any type of layer can be duplicated;
  • Only layers nested in a Frame, Main Component, or Instance are considered by the plugin;
  • If a Main Component is selected it will be duplicated as an Instance;
  • The duplicated layers are placed on top of the target frame layers;
  • A Main Component can be selected as a target frame. An Instance cannot;
  • The original and target frames can differ in dimension;
  • A valid selection is only replaced by another valid selection;
  • The operation time will increase if a large amount of layers and target frames are selected.
  • The plugin only duplicates the layers when pressing â€œDuplicate layersâ€. Any change applied to the original selection after pressing â€œSelectâ€ will be duplicated. Any deleted layer will not be found by the plugin;
  • The plugin will measure the success of the operation by showing how many layers werenâ€™t found, and how many were duplicated inside and outside the bounds of the target frames.
